page.title: 15HOBBIES
page.content:
Our hobbies include the following: indoor football,gymnastics,ballet, computing,playing the piano,bird watching,autograph hunting,keeping pets,oil painting,flower arranging, plastic modelling,model railways, photography and aircraft spotting.
Collecting:-stamps,beer mats,coins, postcards,erasers,badges,militaria, seashells,bottles,books,records,tapes, paperweights,horse-brasses,jewelry, posters,china,spoons,pencils,buttons, pens,dolls,soap,ornarments,teddybears, models,programmes,car-numbers,train- numbers,carrier-bags,buttons,keyrings, butterflies,stickers,ribbons,medals, paintings,pipes.
